data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Xuzhou, Jiangsu, China to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Xuzhou, Jiangsu, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Xuzhou, Jiangsu, China to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Xuzhou, Jiangsu, China.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Xuzhou, Jiangsu, China a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 228,107 believers in Xuzhou against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Xinyi
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Xinyi, Jiangsu, China.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Xuzhou, Jiangsu, China to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Xuzhou to agree with you and with one another.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Xuzhou, Jiangsu, China not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.
